item.title: Ukulele Time: Scarborough Fair - Simon & Garfunkel - Key of Gm
item.description: Play along video for the song Scarborough Fair from the channel Ukulele Time. Artist: Simon & Garfunkel. Chords: B♭, B♭maj7, C, F, Gm.
